meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a lipoma.
meanings.sent1: The lipomatous growth on the patient's arm was soft and painless.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the lipomatous tumor during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The lipomatous lump looked like a harmless cushion under the skin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as lipomatous as a gentle cloud in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The lipomatous texture of the tissue felt like a fluffy pillow.

meanings.definition: Containing or consisting of fatty tissue.
meanings.sent1: The lipomatous cells stored excess fat in the body.
meanings.sent2: The lipomatous layer provided insulation to the organ.
meanings.sent3: The lipomatous bacon sizzled in the pan, releasing its savory aroma.
meanings.sent4: His words were as lipomatous as butter, smooth and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The lipomatous content of the meal made it rich and satisfying.
